problem_names:
lemma least_map_leD:
    assumes "x \<in> least_map f S"
    assumes "y\<in>S"
    shows "f x \<le> f y"

lemma least_map_insert_min:
    fixes f::"'a\<Rightarrow>'b::order"
    assumes "\<forall>y\<in>S. f x \<le> f y"
    shows "x \<in> least_map f (insert x S)"

lemma least_map_insert_nmin: 
    "\<lbrakk> x\<in>least_map f S; f x \<le> f a \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x\<in>least_map f (insert a S)"

lemma inf_absorb_less[simp]:
    "a < b \<Longrightarrow> inf a b = a"
    "a < b \<Longrightarrow> inf b a = a"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. least_map f S \<subseteq> S

lemma least_map_leD:
    assumes "x \<in> least_map f S"
    assumes "y\<in>S"
    shows "f x \<le> f y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f x \<le> f y

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> least_map f S
  y \<in> S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f x \<le> f y
by (auto elim: least_map.cases intro!: least_map.intros simp: refl)

lemma least_map_insert_min:
    fixes f::"'a\<Rightarrow>'b::order"
    assumes "\<forall>y\<in>S. f x \<le> f y"
    shows "x \<in> least_map f (insert x S)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> least_map f (insert x S)

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>y\<in>S. f x \<le> f y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> least_map f (insert x S)

lemma least_map_insert_nmin: 
    "\<lbrakk> x\<in>least_map f S; f x \<le> f a \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x\<in>least_map f (insert a S)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<in> least_map f S; f x \<le> f a\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> least_map f (insert a S)

lemma inf_absorb_less[simp]:
    "a < b \<Longrightarrow> inf a b = a"
    "a < b \<Longrightarrow> inf b a = a"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a < b \<Longrightarrow> inf a b = a) &&&
    (a < b \<Longrightarrow> inf b a = a)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a < b \<Longrightarrow> inf b a = a
